Package nz.org.venice.prefs.settings

Interface Summary
Settings  
SettingsWriter  
 

Class Summary
AbstractSettings This class can save the toplevel Module data which is common to all modules.
AnalyserModuleSettings  
AnalyserResultSettings  
ChartModuleSettings This class represents ChartModule data which can be saved for the purposes of restoring the modules upon restart.
GraphSettings This class represents Graph data which can be saved for the purposes of restoring the modules upon restart.
GraphSettingsGroup  
HelpModuleSettings  
MenuSettings This class represents Graph data which can be saved for the purposes of restoring the modules upon restart.
ModuleFrameSettings This class stores geometry data and a module identifier for saved frames.
ModuleFrameSettingsReader This class parses ModuleFrameSettings written in XML format.
ModuleFrameSettingsWriter This class writes settings in XML format.
ModuleSettingsParserException An exception raised when there is an error parsing Settings.
PortfolioModuleSettings  
PortfolioSettingsReader  
PortfolioTableModuleSettings  
PreferencesModuleSettings  
QuoteModuleSettings  
TransactionModuleSettings  
WatchScreenSettings  
XMLHelper This class is for Java version 1.4 which doesn't have support for XPATH
